main event: A series of UFO sightings were reported over Bay City, Michigan, on March 4, 1968, including descriptions of a bright orange object.
interesting points: Nine witnesses confirmed seeing the object, which was described as bright orange and resembling a cigar., The object was observed for about 50 to 60 seconds before disappearing suddenly., Sighting occurred at 6:50 PM under clear sky conditions., Witnesses claimed the object had rapid changes in direction and speed., The conclusion suggested the object might have been a hot air balloon.
witness description: Observers reported the object to be a luminous, reddish-orange color, possibly round but did not appear solid.
